data.text: @MLevitt_NP2013 @guardian You should apply this lesson to your retweets, especially from anti-vax accounts.

@MLevitt_NP2013 @guardian Yes great news and a real fillip for the push to drop all measures for all Kiwis. If Rights are able to be withdrawn due to circumstances then they’re not Rights they’re privileges.  What, if any, circumstance is this ever acceptable
@MLevitt_NP2013 @Deedoherty2 @guardian Despite this, the spinners will continue to the bitter end. https://t.co/7pZ6bwlRLo
